content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's keep the focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location of your apartment and its modern features, I believe the standard market rate is slightly higher than what I'm able to afford at the moment. Could we perhaps negotiate a lower price, say around 850 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're proposing is too low for my liking. I'm looking for a higher price to rent out my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
